items.title: Traveling abroad
items.description: In addition to [Living Cost](https://livingcost.org), [Travel Safe Abroad](https://www.travelsafe-abroad.com/) is a very helpful website when you go on vacation. There are two things you probably never think about when choosing a destination: the cost of living - for estimating expenses - and how safe the country really is.

items.title: remotion.dev
items.description: This is a tool that lets you create videos with your knowledge of React. You can scale your video production with server-side rendering and parametrization. So, basically, if you know React you can make videos - very handy!

items.title: Bellroy wallets
items.description: For years I have been using a Bellroy slim sleeve wallet and it's still the best wallet I can think of. It's small, has a clean design and can carry everything I like.

items.title: Fresku
items.description: Fresku isn't known for his singing talent, but rather for his captivating lyrics packed with satire. He's a staple in the Dutch hip-hop scene producing tracks for more than a decade. His playful flow will guide you through his metaphorical lyrics and will leave you pondering. Recently, he released a single from his upcoming album, where he addresses the problematic use of social media.

items.title: Kaomoji
items.description: My go-to anime/Japanese clothing webshop! Based in the Netherlands, they make stunning designs. They just launched a new collection, and I love it so much. RIP my money. ðŸª¦

items.title: Squoosh
items.description: Squoosh is a secure web application that lets you shrink images in file size but makes sure they still maintain high quality. Smaller images are better for SEO optimization.

items.title: Spline
items.description: Spline is a design tool for 3D web experiences. It simplifies creating things in 3D by providing a simple tool to create modals and export them directly to code, videos, or gifs.

author: Wheelhouse
title: One year of Wheelhouse picks
introduction: Each month, we pick one thing we love and put it into a list. This list might give you some insight into how people at Wheelhouse think and what intrigues us. This month, we have got three more employees sharing their top picks - get to know them a little better! ðŸ¥³
description: You know the drill! This time, however, we have got the biggest amount of top picks ever ðŸ¥³
